faq_section.title: Common Questions
faq_section.subtitle: Clarifying the complex world of AI and Web3.

items.question: Do I need to be a Web3 company to work with you?
items.answer: Not at all. We work with traditional Web2 brands looking to optimize their digital presence using AI, as well as companies looking to make their first entry into Web3. Our 'Bridge' approach means we meet you where you are.

items.question: How does AI integration help my marketing?
items.answer: We use AI to analyze vast amounts of data to predict trends, personalize customer experiences at scale, and optimize ad spend in real-time. This typically results in a 20-40% increase in ROI compared to traditional methods.

items.question: What is your typical project timeline?
items.answer: Timelines vary by project scope. A typical brand strategy and website overhaul takes 6-8 weeks, while a comprehensive Web3 launch strategy might take 3-4 months. We provide detailed roadmaps during our initial consultation.

items.question: Do you handle smart contract development?
items.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated team of Solidity and Rust engineers who work alongside our creative team to ensure your protocol is not only beautiful but secure and functional.
